reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Initiative to achieve gender equality by expanding the representation of women in municipalities

description.narrative: Public Union Association for the Protection of Womens Rights after D Aliyeva will implement the project ?Initiative to achieve gender equality by expanding the representation of women in municipalities?. The goal of the project is to achieve gender equali ty and increase the role of women in the decision-making by increasing the number of women in elected bodies. Project activities incl. training seminars for the municipality candidates for election candidates and their team members will be organized.

Project activities incl. training seminars for the municipality candidates for election candidates and their team members will be organized.
